subject: Greeting from USA I.R.S,
body:
Greeting from USA I.R.S,
I am MR.JULIUS NANA , The Commissioner Of Internal Revenue Service,We write to inform you that your Consignment box containing sum of$12,000,000.00 USD Twelve Million United State Dollars is still at theCustoms warehouse waiting for resolutions of the $20 so that ChiefJustice shall signed those documents so that customs will safe andfree the Diplomatic Agent to delivery of your consignment to you atyour door step address.
The lottery won by your e-mail address via online active email addressselected from sponsor of Coca Cola Company award. We have arrestedMrs.Kathleen since last week for trying to claim your Consignment box,according to Mrs.Kathleen,she said that she is your younger sister andyou are at hospital so she want to claim the $12,000,000.00 USD toenable her pay your hospital bill, But we later got an informationfrom Diplomatic Agent that you inform him that you did not know thesaid Mrs.Kathleen and she is not your sister.
We have got Mrs.Kathleen arrested and you did not want to make anyeffort how your consignment will delivered to your house, NowMrs.Kathleen is still claiming her right that we got her arrested fornothing that you are the person who sent her to claim the$12,000,000.00 USD, So you are advised to comply immediately to avoidreleasing the consignment to the wrong person/hands. follow theinstruction immediately for your own good and future
Right now what is holding your consignment is $20
 and every otherdocuments guiding your delivery is well updated.Furthermore you areadvice to be very  fast as the Agent Mr.Frank john has no time towaste due to his flight ticket, Be informed that the Diplomatic Agentis still at your Airport waiting to dispatch the consignment to yourdesignated,
You are advised to send the $20 immediately so that I will meet theChief Justice to signed those documents and FAX to the Customs in yourAirport to release the $12,000,000.00 USD to the Diplomatic Agent tocomplete this delivery to you, This is huge amount of money that youcan invest to ease the economic crunch and to be profitable and helpothers in need as a measure to ease the present economic hardship.
You are advised to buy Steam Wallet Gift Card or Amazon card of $20USD scratch it and send the photo to me for your own good,
The consignments were declared as personal effects and classifieddocuments while in actual fact contain raw cash. US currency notes in$200 USD denominations carefully packed and stashed in trunk box.Approximately, $12,000,000.00 USD. The electronic scanner revealed itwhen the package was scanned in the airport.
Finally we say congratulation to you because you are the realownership of the consignment box according to the information we gothere in our data base system. 
Right now what is holding yourconsignments box is only $20 USD, You are advised to buy Amazon cardor Steam wallet Card of 20 USD.
Treat with urgency,
Get back to us right now.
Thanks and Remain blessed in the Lord.
Sincerely.MR.JULIUS NANA Commissioner of Internal Revenue Service,

subject: Re: Greeting from USA I.R.S,
body:
Hello NANA,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate the information you have provided regarding the box containing USD Twelve Million United State Dollars. It's quite an astonishing amount!

I must admit, though, that I am a bit confused about the situation. Could you please clarify why the box is still at the warehouse and what needs to be done in order for it to be released? You mentioned something about signed documents and customs clearance.

Additionally, I'm curious to know more about how my address won a lottery sponsored by Coca Cola Company. That sounds like quite an exciting opportunity! Can you provide more details about this lottery and how I was selected as a winner?

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Yolanda

subject: Re: Greeting from USA I.R.S,
body:

Your full name

Am waiting for your response

subject: Re: Greeting from USA I.R.S,
body:
Hello,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your offer, but I have a few questions before proceeding. Can you please provide more information about the Chief Justice and why their signature is required for these documents? Additionally, could you explain how buying a Steam Wallet Gift Card will help in this situation? I want to make sure I understand everything clearly before taking any further steps.

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Yolanda
